item.title: Justin Sun: Meme Coin is the transformation of internet attention into money.
item.description: On August 27th, Justin Sun stated in a recent interview with The Late Point that meme coins are centered around transforming internet attention into money. For instance, issuing a Biden coin at present would not attract any buyers because Biden has not yet completed the transition from being the name of the U.S. president to an IP or a particular type of meme. There exists a substantial gap between coins that anyone can issue and having the issued token be recognized, and one must excel in the internet attention economy in order to become a winner.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen $777 million in liquidations, with long positions taking the biggest hit.
item.description: On August 27th, according to Coinglass data, a total of $777 million was liquidated across the network in the past 24 hours. Among them, there were $646 million in long liquidations and $131 million in short liquidations.

item.title: NMR Surges Past $11, Up Over 33% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, Numerai (NMR) has risen above $11 and is now trading at $11.16, with a 24-hour price increase of 33.69%.Previously reported, Numerai received a commitment of up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Numerai has received a commitment for up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.
item.description: On August 27th, as reported by Bloomberg, Numerai LLC based in San Francisco has declared that it has obtained a commitment of up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Coinbase International will list perpetual contracts for GMT, OMNI, and SNX
item.description: On August 27th, according to official information, Coinbase International is going to list GMT, OMNI, and SNX perpetual contracts.

item.title: OKX CEO Star: The OKX Wallet is fully based on self-custody and is essentially a software-as-a-service provider.
item.description: August 26th. OKX CEO Star announced on social media that the OKX Wallet is completely self-custodial, encompassing the invitation system. In essence, OKX is not allowed to access or transfer user funds, nor can it modify user invitation relationships.OKX's emphasis on self-custody demonstrates its dedication to user asset security and is in line with global regulatory norms. The OKX Wallet is essentially a software service provider, similar to a blockchain search engine and a Chrome browser, offering users an entry point to the Web3 world.

item.title: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lael Brainard: Will Sue Over Trump's Firing
item.description: On August 26th, according to market information, a lawyer representing Federal Reserve Board Governor Powell announced that he will initiate a lawsuit regarding the (Trump) dismissal. (Golden Ten)

item.title: BIT Mining Partners with Brale to Launch USD Stablecoin DOLAI on Solana
item.description: August 26th. As per official information, the cryptocurrency mining firm BIT Mining (NYSE: BTCM) has introduced the USD stablecoin DOLAI onto Solana by means of Brale's compliance platform. DOLAI is entirely supported by cash and short-term US Treasury bonds.

item.title: deBridge has announced that it has integrated the Tron network
item.description: On August 26th, according to official information, the cross-chain interoperability protocol deBridge announced its integration with the Tron network. Users are now able to carry out real-time asset exchanges between Tron, Ethereum, Solana, and more than twenty other blockchains.This integration has incorporated Tron's high-throughput network into deBridge's routing system, allowing nearly half of the circulating USDT stablecoin to achieve low-slippage and MEV-protected transfers.

item.title: Play Solana game console PSG1 will start shipping on October 6th
item.description: On August 26th, as per official information, Play Solana declared that the first-generation gaming handheld PSG1 would commence shipping on October 6th, and this device would be equipped with a built-in Solana wallet.
